alert.note: Alert for Camden; Chowan; Currituck; Gates; Pasquotank; Perquimans (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued December 10 at 5:35PM EST until December 10 at 8:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 721 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 8 PM EST THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN NORTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST NORTH CAROLINA CAMDEN CHOWAN CURRITUCK GATES PASQUOTANK PERQUIMANS IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 17 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST VIRGINIA CITY OF CHESAPEAKE CITY OF FRANKLIN CITY OF HAMPTON CITY OF NEWPORT NEWS CITY OF NORFOLK CITY OF POQUOSON CITY OF PORTSMOUTH CITY OF SUFFOLK CITY OF VIRGINIA BEACH CITY OF WILLIAMSBURG GLOUCESTER ISLE OF WIGHT JAMES CITY SOUTHAMPTON SURRY SUSSEX YORK THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF BACONS CASTLE, BARHAM, BOOTH FORK, BOWERS HILL, BOYKINS, BUSCH GARDENS, CAPE COLONY, CENTERVILLE, CHESAPEAKE AIRPORT, CHIPPOKES STATE PARK, CHRISTENSONS CORNER, COURTLAND, CROAKER, CURRITUCK, DEEP CREEK, EDENTON, ELIZABETH CITY, EWELL, FENTRESS, FIVE FORKS, FRANKLIN, GATESVILLE, GLOUCESTER POINT, GREAT BRIDGE, GREENBRIER, GROVE, GWALTNEY CORNER, HAMPTON, HANCOCK, HERTFORD, HOG ISLAND GAME RESERVE, HORSESHOE, HUNTERDALE, IVOR, LILLY, MACEDONIA, MAVATON, MOUNT PLEASANT, NEWPORT NEWS, NORFOLK, POOLESVILLE, POQUOSON, PORTSMOUTH, SAINT JOHNS, SHARON, SMITHFIELD, SUFFOLK, VALHALLA, VIRGINIA BEACH, WAKEFIELD, WAVERLY, WILLIAMSBURG, AND YORKTOWN.
